item.title: Hair through hood with silab server? please help
item.dc:creator: @mrbob1219 mrbob1219
item.description:
@mrbob1219 wrote:

[quote=“silabmods, post:2, topic:202714”]i think its has something to do with items.java, you need to add the hood in item4.java ( if you have it ) at following categories

    public static int hats[] = {

and

    public static int fullMask[] = {

If you have a problem with dragon full helm ( same problem ) add it in same categories
helm’s ID: 15195[/quote]

    public static int fullMask[] = {

Dont put the id in fullMask put it in

    public static int fullHelm[] = {

Read full topic
